title: Mining
name: Name
estimatedPointsRankingDesc: Estimated points ranking for this period. Final points will be calculated and confirmed after the period ends.
highestVolumeDesc: Get the highest Maker and Taker trading volume during the period.
behaviorClassificationDesc1: Maker Volume: Refers to the transaction amount generated when a user acts as a maker, with orders matched through limit orders.
behaviorClassificationDesc2: Taker Volume: Refers to the transaction amount generated when a user actively takes liquidity from the order book.
pointDistributionDesc1: Users must have both valid Maker and Taker volumes within a reward cycle (e.g., daily or weekly) to qualify for point calculation.
pointDistributionDesc2: If only one-sided behavior exists (only Maker or only Taker), no point rewards will be distributed.
pointCalculationDesc1: The system separately tracks all users' Maker and Taker volumes during the cycle.
pointCalculationDesc2: Calculate each user's volume proportion in both behavior categories and multiply by the corresponding Maker or Taker point pool.
pointCalculationDesc3: The final points earned will be the smaller value of the two results.
useOfPointsDesc: Can be exchanged for platform tokens in the future, stay tuned
calculateMakerPoints: Calculate Each User's Maker Points Proportionally
calculateTakerPoints: Calculate Each User's Taker Points Proportionally
finalPoints: Final Points is the Smaller of the Two
makerExplanation1: User's Maker volume proportion × Total reward pool A
makerExplanation2: If you account for 5% of all users' Maker volume, you get 5% of the Maker point pool
makerNote1: Only users who meet the "both Maker and Taker volume" requirement are calculated
makerNote2: Otherwise, the user will not participate in the distribution of point pool A
takerExplanation1: User's Taker volume proportion × Total reward pool B
takerExplanation2: Similarly, only eligible users are considered
takerNote1: Users who only perform Taker behavior without Maker behavior will have 0 points despite having transactions
takerNote2: This is to prevent arbitrage by only accumulating Taker volume
dataDefVMaker: User u's maker volume during the statistical period
dataDefVTaker: User u's taker volume during the statistical period
dataDefSumVMaker: Sum of all eligible users' Maker volumes
dataDefSumVTaker: Sum of all eligible users' Taker volumes
dataDefA: Total points allocated for Maker volume in this period (Maker reward pool)
dataDefB: Total points allocated for Taker volume in this period (Taker reward pool)
